name: Solar Interference
description:
Navigation is malfunctioning and you have to escape before you crash into the sun. Unfortunately, the closer you get to the sun, the more interference it creates with your systems. Hurry before time runs out!

WASD to move

Space or W to Jump and walk on walls

Mouse to aim

Left Mouse to fire laser (hold to charge)

Entry in GMTK Game Jam 2020. First game jam.

Special thanks to Alek Agena for the pixel art star field. Everything else done solo.
